casebody.data:
TEL-INSTRUMENT ELECTRONICS CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee, and JCAIR, Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 03-5094. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Feb. 9, 2004.

Before LOURIE, LINN, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
